memberdef.argsstring: (const Consensus::Params &params, int64_t height, uint32_t old_nbits, uint32_t new_nbits)
memberdef.name: PermittedDifficultyTransition

detaileddescription.para: Return false if the proof-of-work requirement specified by new_nbits at a given height is not possible, given the proof-of-work on the prior block as specified by old_nbits.
This function only checks that the new value is within a factor of 4 of the old value for blocks at the difficulty adjustment interval, and otherwise requires the values to be the same.
Always returns true on networks where min difficulty blocks are allowed, such as regtest/testnet.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint256 hash, unsigned int nBits, const Consensus::Params &params)
memberdef.name: CheckProofOfWork

detaileddescription.para: Check whether a block hash satisfies the proof-of-work requirement specified by nBits

simplesect.para: the proof-of-work target or nullopt if the nBits value is invalid (due to overflow or exceeding pow_limit)

memberdef.argsstring: (uint256 hash, unsigned int nBits, const Consensus::Params &params)
memberdef.name: CheckProofOfWorkImpl
